taskDescription: trans-3,4-Dimethylcyclobutene can open by two conrotatory paths to give either (2E,4E)-2,4-hexadiene or (2Z,4Z)-2,4-hexadiene. Explain why both products are symmetry-allowed, and then account for the fact that only the 2E,4E isomer is obtained in practice.
detailedSolution: The more stable of two allowed products is formed.
